abstract: Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey is expected to announce plans on Wednesday for an overhaul of the troubled Atlantic City gambling district and the possible closing of the ailing Meadowlands Racetrack, The New York Times reported.
snippet: Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey is expected to announce plans on Wednesday for an overhaul of the troubled Atlantic City gambling district and the possible closing of the ailing Meadowlands Racetrack, The New York Times reported.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey is expected to announce plans on Wednesday for an overhaul of the troubled Atlantic City gambling district and the possible closing of the ailing Meadowlands Racetrack, The New York Times’s Charles V. Bagli reported, citing an adviser to the governor.

headline.main: Governor to Offer Plan to Overhaul Atlantic City
